data.name: Noyah: Corrupted Memories
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game


Play it your way, each hero has 3 different card categories, attack, defense, and utility. You can put together the combinations that best suit your play style.

Each category also has its own relics, which can further enhance your gameplay.

Advanced Rune System

Enhance your deck with an advanced rune system that adds unique talents to your cards. This allows the deck construction to have endless possibilities.

The Corruption

The world is in a constant fight against corruption, which grows stronger as the days go by and applies disease to your world. These diseases directly interfere with combat and game difficulty, since the number of diseases increases with each full moon (7 days).

Day & Night Cycle

Create strategies and prepare for the night in the midst of battle. At dusk, monsters of the night appear and black portals are opened. Get exclusive rewards if you win a night battle!

Weather Events

Rains, sandstorms, blizzards. Some events can benefit you, but others can end your battle, be aware and use them to your advantage.

Content

  • 150+ Cards
  • 70+ Relics
  • 30+ Runes
  • 50+ Battle Encounters
  • 30+ Mysterious Encounters
  • 7 Maps

data.short_description: Noyah: Corrupted Memories is a roguelike deckbuilder, in pixel art, with random battle generation, day and night cycle, climate events, advanced rune system, that allows you to create endless possibilities with a single card.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
